ObjectStates.LuaScript:
f_color = {0,0,0,95}
local cloneTo ={ 11.388285, 0.96, -12.243199 }

local allBagpos={-1.43877,1.079334,13.821}
local objectLibary = {
    modelCard = '3ce58e',
    refrenceCard="903d61";
    allBag="000888";
    guildBag="c98d47";
    arcanistBag="fb3900";
    resurrectionistsBag="000839";
    neverbornBag="88b910";
    outcastsBag="d95ea4";
    tenThundersBag="64e45c";
    bayouBag="11cdcb";
    explorerSocietyBag="313d9c";
    upgradesBag="f5da9d";

}
function onLoad(save_state)
    self.createButton({
        label="",
        click_function="genCards",
        tooltip="Gen Cards",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.11,0},
        height=600,
        width=1000,
        alignment = 3,
        scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
        font_size=300,
        font_color=f_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })
end

function genCards(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    local library = getObjectFromGUID("c78aef")
    local modelLibeary=library.call("getModelLibrary")
    local statCardPrototype = getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.modelCard)
    
    local allBag = getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.allBag)
    local waitbase=5
    local wait=waitbase
    for key,model in pairs(modelLibeary) do

        Wait.frames(function() addModel(statCardPrototype,model,allBagpos) end,wait)
        wait=wait+waitbase
        local factionPosition={0,0,0}
        if model["faction"]=="Guild" then
            factionPosition=getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.guildBag).getPosition()
        end
        if model["faction"]=="Arcanist" then
            factionPosition=getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.arcanistBag).getPosition()
        end
        if model["faction"]=="Resurrectionists" then
            factionPosition=getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.resurrectionistsBag).getPosition()
        end
        if model["faction"]=="Neverborn" then
            factionPosition=getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.neverbornBag).getPosition()
        end
        if model["faction"]=="Outcasts" then
            factionPosition=getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.outcastsBag).getPosition()
        end
        if model["faction"]=="Ten Thunders" then
            factionPosition=getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.tenThundersBag).getPosition()
        end
        if model["faction"]=="Bayou" then
            factionPosition=getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.bayouBag).getPosition()
        end
        if model["faction"]=="Explorer Society" then
            factionPosition=getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.explorerSocietyBag).getPosition()
        end
        Wait.frames(function() addModel(statCardPrototype,model,factionPosition) end,wait)
    end
    local refrenceCardLibeary=library.call("getCrewCardLibrary")
    local refCardPrototype= getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.refrenceCard)
    for key,refCard in pairs(refrenceCardLibeary) do
        local statCard = refCardPrototype.clone({position=getObjectFromGUID(objectLibary.upgradesBag).getPosition()})
        Wait.frames(function() statCard.call("createRefrenceCard",refCard) end,1)        
    end
end

function addModel(prototype,model,pos)
    local statCard = prototype.clone({position=pos})
    Wait.frames(function() statCard.call("createStatCard",model) end,1)
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
